69  template <class t>
70  class factory : public Ifactory {
72  std::string m_sConventionalName;
73 
74  public:
79  factory();

104 
105  template<class t>
106  factory<t>::factory() {
107  //We are the new m_pHead before the previous one
108  m_pNext = m_pHead;
109  m_pHead = this;
110 
111  // set compiler name
112  m_sConventionalName = typeid (t).name();
113  }
114 
115  template<class t>
116  factory<t>::factory(std::string conventional_name) : m_sConventionalName(conventional_name) {
117  //We are the new m_pHead before the previous one
118  m_pNext = m_pHead;
119  m_pHead = this;
120  }
121 
122  template<class t>
123  void* factory<t>::create(std::string& class_name) {
124  return (m_sConventionalName == class_name)
125  ? (void*) (new t)
126  : 0;
127  }
128 
129  template<class t>
130  std::string factory<t>::get_conventional_name(std::string& compiler_name) {
131  return ( compiler_name == typeid (t).name())
132  ? m_sConventionalName
133  : std::string("");
134  }
135 
136  template<class t>
137  factory<t>::~factory() {
138  Ifactory **ppNext = &Ifactory::m_pHead;
139 
140  for (; *ppNext; ppNext = &(*ppNext)->m_pNext) {
141  if (*ppNext == this) {
142  *ppNext = (*ppNext)->m_pNext;
143  break;
144  }
145  }
146  }
147 
154  template<class t>
155  void create(std::string cls_name, t** ppObj) {
156  Ifactory *pCurrent = Ifactory::m_pHead;
157 
158  //the follow line reinterpret several times
159  //invalid null pointer so compilers could
160  //segnal warining.
161  for (; pCurrent; pCurrent = pCurrent->m_pNext)
162  if ((*ppObj = reinterpret_cast<t*> (pCurrent->create(cls_name))) != NULL) break;
163 
164  }
165 
171  std::string get_conventional_name(std::string compiler_name);

173  class exception : public std::exception {

176  public:

180  exception(const exception& right)
181  : m_swhat(right.what()) {
182  }
183 
184  exception& operator=(const exception& right) {
185  m_swhat = right.what();
186  return *this;
187  }
188

190  virtual const char *what() const throw ();
191 
192 
193  };
